dalserver

Class DbmsQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.DbmsQuery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScsQuery, SiapQuery, SsapQuery

    public class DbmsQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    DbmsQuery provides a thin layer for the Java DriverManager (JDBC) class to deal with the peculiarities of different supported database managers as used within the DALServer framework. To add support for a new DBMS, install the JDBC driver in LIB, add file management for it in build.xml, and modify DbmsQuery as necessary to support the DBMS. In some cases conditional code may be required in service code to deal with differences in SQL expressions, although usually a portable approach can be found for simple queries (adding TAP may eventually solve all these problems).
